title: Automatic meromorphy in non-archimedean geometry
abstract:
In this text we prove that if X is a reduced non-archimedean analytic space
and f is a analytic function on a dense Zariski-open subspace of X whose
zero-locus is closed in X, then f is a meromorphic function on X. As a
corollary, we deduce that every invertible analytic function on the
analytification of a reduced scheme of finite type over an affinoid algebra is
algebraic.
